name: jhonasttan.GitHub.io
body:
### Welcome! Who am I?
I am an established leader and technologist with subject matter expertise in Equities Trading and use Project Management methodologies and ITIL best practices to align Production Support teams, IT partners and third party vendors with the needs of clients and stakeholders to deliver on follow-the-sun trading support coverage models, production stability and strategic solutions.

### Coding Portfolio
This site is a work in progress and will contain code repositories, to be built up as I undergo Data Science training with NYC Data Science Academy.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
